website_summaries.verdict: Dry line chalker, available in 25-pound or 65-pound capacities.
pros: It's nice that buyers can choose from chalk supply capacities depending on their needs
The majority of buyers were happy with this product in terms of its performance and durability
cons: There were also some customer complaints about chalk leakage and quality of materials

customer_reviews.title: Missing most important piece
customer_reviews.text: Receive the item. The box was damaged as the description indicated. That was not the problem. The problem is that the metal rod that connects the handle to the unit was missing. I am okay with a screw missing but not the piece that actually makes the product work. Would like to understand how the connecting rod was not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Well built with heavy guage steel. Was easy to assemble and worked correctly without any issues. Should last a very long time because of its simplicity. Adjustment level has "off", "2inch", and "4inch" settings. Had originally thought that a 4 wheel unit would be better but, this unit works great. The line on top of the hopper lid surves as a guide.
customer_reviews.author: VetteZ06

customer_reviews.title: This dispenser works great. I was concerned because of the two wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser works great. I was concerned because of the two wheels that it wound be hard to lay down a straight line, but it is not. I do use a string line as a guide when marking my lines though.
customer_reviews.author: John Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Line Marker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sideband complete organic fertlizer that I mix myself. My only complaint is that I spoke with people twice about how much lime this marker would put out or how long of a line it could make if filled to it's 25 lb. capacity. I never heard back. This tool does what it says it will do, put an evenly spread line of dry dusty stuff down right on the ground and where you want it. Looks like it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: tmgibs

customer_reviews.title: The product was quick and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The product was quick and easy to assemble. We originally purchased it to mark out a perimeter for some land. It was easy to use and it has different widths depending on what you are marking and how thick you want your line. The lime would sometimes clog up if you didn’t clean the canister properly. The grip also broke on the first day of use which I would blame on the terrain. The product however does exactly what it states and we continue to use it .
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, but if you close the lever it will still leak if you roll it to your next line destination. I just pick it up so I don't have chalk leaking everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dean

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and one is missing a part to the handle
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: even when it's on the closed position, it still ...
customer_reviews.text: even when it's on the closed position, it still leaves a faint trail of chalk. It also dumps a lot of chalk out and you end up using more chalk than you need.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a last minute event I was putting on. Paid extra for shipping to get it delivered Sunday Showed up without any hardware, and is a cheap Chinese piece of junk. If I didn't absolutely need it first timing tomorrow I would return it. Don't waste your money! Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you are a coach and looking for the perfect solution to chalk your lines this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dudzinski

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Leaks chalk when the door is closed. The preinstalled handle was backwards
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cribbins

customer_reviews.title: This item was easy to assemble and works very well it does a ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to assemble and works very well it does a great job putting down a 2 inch line, has been use many times.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: leaks a little
customer_reviews.text: yes, it leaks a bit... but the rest of the unit is good quality. I will no-doubt be using it for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Ironman

customer_reviews.title: Do buy
customer_reviews.text: The rod that controls the open and closing keeps coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L. Adams-Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price around, very durable! Marking parking lines in our restaurant parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a one person field crew
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use. Perfect for the person that has one or two field to mark each day. Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Sports dude

customer_reviews.title: Just what our club needed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Dog Kennel Club to mark off vender spots, parking etc. it is small enough to store and transport easily yet big enough to get the job done with one fill of chalk. The lever works well for the open and close spout. Adequately made and will last a long time if taken care of properly!!! Shipped fast arrived in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: K9hairdresser

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged in the package
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged. The item did not have any protective foam or padding of any kind inside the box. The lid was bent, making it unable to sit completely level on the bucket. But for the purpose for which I intended, it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Calooy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - received with a broken wheel
customer_reviews.text: This product seems sturdy enough...except I received it with the Right wheel hub (plastic) totally smashed in. As well, I had to straighten out the dispenser lever as a result. We'll soon see if a trip to the hardware store to buy a new wheel is necessary. One thing is for certain...nobody is going to read this and offer to send me a replacement wheel and hub cap!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Crawford

customer_reviews.title: IF THEY HAD DESIGNED LIKE THE OPPOSITE END IT WOULD SECURE THE ROD WITH ...
customer_reviews.text: ROD FOR THE LEVER IS NOT DESIGNED WELL TO BE FASTEND ON A MOVING PART - A TINY NOTCHED WASHER IS USED AS A CLAMP (THE OTHER END HAS A COTTER PIN WHICH WORKS FINE) WHICH FELL OFF IMMEDIATEDLY AS SOON AS A LEVER ADJUSTMENT WAS MADE. IF THEY HAD DESIGNED IT LIKE THE OPPOSITE END IT WOULD SECURE THE ROD WITH A COTTER PIN ALSO AND HOLD UP BETTER FOR USE.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY TRAILS ARENA, INC.

customer_reviews.title: Dry Line Marker Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The Alumagoal Dry Line Marker was used to mark flea market spaces. The 25 lbs capacity made handing very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the aggrivation.
customer_reviews.text: Handle is cheaply made with a poor design. The bar that hooks to the handle that adjusts the flow is connected with a small piece of metal that popped off for the first time when I was putting it together, and then on its first use and was lost. Very poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watt

customer_reviews.title: Good for $
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I anticipated.. also tends to leak a small amount of chalk when turned off and rolling from baseline to baseline... all and all a good choice for small projects (1-3 fields)...
customer_reviews.author: Deucer Peucer

product_meta.title: Alumagoal All-Steel Dry Line Marker, 2-Wheel
product_meta.description: Size:25lbsAll steel construction 2 hard rubber wheels for extra durability Easy to use handle lever adjusts to both 2 and 4 in. lines 25lbs Chalk Capacity
feature_bullets: 2 hard rubber wheels for extra durability
Easily adjustable to either 2" or 4" lines
